Package org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add
    Adds 2 ndarrays
    CountPartitionsFunction<T>
    This is a function use to count the number of elements in each partition.
    LoadSerializedDataSetFunction
    This is a function that is used to load a DataSet object using DataSet#load(InputStream).
    SplitPartitionsFunction<T>
    SplitPartitionsFunction is used to split a RDD (using org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD#mapPartitionsWithIndex(Function2, boolean) via filtering.
    It is similar in design to org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD#randomSplit(double[]) however it is less prone to producing imbalanced splits that that method.
    SplitPartitionsFunction2<T,U>
    Equivelent to SplitPartitionsFunction, but for JavaPairRDDs
